title: Bottle

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a bottle, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of a bottle showing embodying our new design;
FIG. 2 is a front view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a back view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a right view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a left view thereof;
FIG. 6 is a top view thereof; and,
FIG. 7 is a bottom view thereof.
The broken lines shown in the drawings are for illustrative purposes only and form no part of the claimed design.
